# Data Sources

<br>

| Data | Description | Geometry | Format | Source |
|------|-------------|----------|--------|--------|
| HDB Flats | Location of HDB flats in Singapore | Point | CSV | [MyleeSG on kaggle](kaggle.com/mylee2009/singapore-postal-code-mapper) |
| Schools | Location of schools, geocoded from CSV | Point | Shapefile | [data.gov.sg](https://data.gov.sg/dataset/school-directory-and-information) |
| Population | Resident data by planning subzone, age group, sex and type of dwelling | NA | CSV | [Department of Statistics Singapore](https://www.singstat.gov.sg/find-data/search-by-theme/population/geographic-distribution/latest-data) |
| Pre-Schools | Location of childcare centres and kindergartens | Point | KML | [data.gov.sg](https://data.gov.sg/dataset/pre-schools-location) |
| Nature Areas | Boundary of nature reserves and nature areas | Polygon | Shapefile | [data.gov.sg](https://data.gov.sg/dataset/mp14-sdcp-pw-plan-nature-boundary) |
| Parks | Boundary of parks managed by NParks | Polygon | KML | [data.gov.sg](https://data.gov.sg/dataset/nparks-parks) |
